headline: McDonald's Sales Surge Most in Two Years on $5 Meal Push
summary: McDonald's Corp.'s US sales grew at the fastest pace in more than two years in the fourth quarter as value meals continued to resonate with cost-conscious diners.   Sales from established US restaurants jumped 6.8% in the period from a year ago when foot traffic was dented by an E. coli outbreak, ahead of analyst estimates and the highest since 2023. Earnings, excluding one-time items, also outpaced the average of estimates compiled by Bloomberg, as did comparable sales at the company's two international divisions.

raw.headline: McDonald's Sales Surge Most in Two Years on $5 Meal Push

Earnings, excluding one-time items, also outpaced the average of estimates compiled by Bloomberg, as did comparable sales at the company's two international divisions.

headline: McDonald's is all in on its Extra Value Meals, global CFO says
summary: Worldwide fast-food chain McDonald's (MCD) came out with its fourth quarter results on Thursday, revealing both US and global sales growth while topping quarterly earnings and revenue estimates. McDonald's executive vice president and Global CFO Ian Borden sits down with Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma to speak more about how the restaurant is working to unlock value and affordability options for customers, how the industry is reacting to the mass adoption of GLP-1 weight-loss drugs, and McDonald's investments into beef and higher-protein menu items. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: McDonald's (MCD) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Christopher Kempczinski: Good afternoon, everyone, and thank you for joining us today.  In 2025, McDonald's delivered system-wide sales of nearly $140 billion, up 5.5% in constant currency for the full year.  This reflects solid comp sales growth of more than 3% for the full year and over 5.5% in the fourth quarter with strong growth across all segments.
